nodes.text: The Imperial Combat Assault Transport, also known as the Juggernaut turbo tank and Juggernaut transport vehicle, was a model of cargo transport used on Morak as part of its Imperial remnants. At least four Juggernauts were stationed on the Imperial refinery there, including Juggernaut Three, Juggernaut Four, and Juggernaut Five. They were all destroyed during a mission to Morak undertaken by Din Djarin, Carasynthia Dune, Migs Mayfeld, Fennec Shand, and Boba Fett.
